smtp_server.description: SMTP server hostname (e.g., 'smtp.gmail.com'). Must be valid SMTP server

port.description: SMTP server port number. Default: 465 for secure SMTPS connection

sender_email.description: Email address to send from. Must match SMTP server authentication

sender_password.description: Password or app-specific password for SMTP authentication

ssl.description: Use SSL/TLS for secure connection. Default: true (recommended)

recipient_email.description: Email address to send to. Must be valid email format

subject.description: Subject line for the email. Required field

body.description: Main content of the email. Supports plain text format

message.description: Detailed result message, includes error details if failed
